topic: AI Safety and Multimodal Models Research

  entities:
    Gemini|Model
    ShieldGemma|Approach
    DeepMind|Organization
    Jerry Wei|Researcher
    IBM|Organization
    Swapnaja Achintalwar|Researcher
    BLIP|Approach
    BLIP-2|Approach
    xGen-MM|Model
    BLIP-Diffusion|Approach
    Unicontrol|Model
    Salesforce|Organization

  proposition: Gemini is a family of highly capable multimodal models published by Google researchers.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Gemini|DESCRIBED_BY|highly capable multimodal models
    Gemini|PUBLISHED_BY|Google researchers

    entity-entity relationships:
    Gemini|DEVELOPED_BY|Google researchers

  proposition: ShieldGemma is a generative AI content moderation approach based on the Gemini model.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    ShieldGemma|TYPE|generative AI content moderation approach

    entity-entity relationships:
    ShieldGemma|BASED_ON|Gemini

  proposition: DeepMind introduced the Frontier Safety Framework in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    DeepMind|INTRODUCED|Frontier Safety Framework
    Frontier Safety Framework|YEAR_INTRODUCED|2023

  proposition: Jerry Wei et al. published research on long-form factuality in large language models in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jerry Wei|PUBLISHED|research on long-form factuality
    Research|YEAR_PUBLISHED|2024
    Research|FOCUS|long-form factuality in large language models

  proposition: IBM developed the Granite Foundation Models and a framework for securing generative AI.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    IBM|DEVELOPED|Granite Foundation Models
    IBM|DEVELOPED|framework for securing generative AI

  proposition: Researchers Swapnaja Achintalwar et al. published a study on detectors for safe and reliable large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Swapnaja Achintalwar|PUBLISHED|study on detectors for safe and reliable large language models

  proposition: BLIP is a bootstrapping language-image pre-training approach for vision-language understanding.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    BLIP|TYPE|bootstrapping language-image pre-training approach
    BLIP|PURPOSE|vision-language understanding

  proposition: BLIP-2 extended the initial BLIP model by using frozen image encoders and large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    BLIP-2|EXTENDS|BLIP model

    entity-entity relationships:
    BLIP-2|USES|frozen image encoders
    BLIP-2|USES|large language models

  proposition: xGen-MM (BLIP-3) is a family of open large multimodal models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    xGen-MM|TYPE|open large multimodal models

  proposition: BLIP-Diffusion enables pre-trained subject representation for controllable text-to-image generation and editing.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    BLIP-Diffusion|ENABLES|pre-trained subject representation
    BLIP-Diffusion|PURPOSE|controllable text-to-image generation and editing

  proposition: Unicontrol is a unified diffusion model for controllable visual generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Unicontrol|TYPE|unified diffusion model
    Unicontrol|PURPOSE|controllable visual generation

  proposition: Salesforce has developed principles for trusted generative AI.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Salesforce|DEVELOPED|principles for trusted generative AI
